regen.absent_element: condition for handling multiple failed re-sync attempts
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle multiple failed re-sync attempts by sending repeated VMEbus resets or entering a safe mode to prevent further system instability.

label: If the failed FCP processor has not synced, it shall send a single voted VMEbus reset through the NE to the failed FCP
absence: action of sending a VMEbus reset
